data.eml:eml: Two new species of Dentilabus Heinrich (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Ichneumoninae) from Japan and Korea, with redefinition of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kikuchi, Namiki, Konishi, Kazuhiko (2018): Two new species of Dentilabus Heinrich (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae: Ichneumoninae) from Japan and Korea, with redefinition of the genus. Zootaxa 4524 (1): 87-96, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.1.6
